column4: hi, can anyone help me?, i'm running vino in my ubuntu, but when someone get connected my cpu goes to 100%, what can i do to avoid this?
vino is the vnc for gnome
but if i let my cpu going 100% for 20 min in a motherboard Via without fan in the processor, it can burn...
i say when someone is conected cpu is 100% until user left the vnc server
well for me what ever i do for that second my cpu is 100% but my load is not highish at all
have you ever used linux before?
it just that your cpu is working 100%
you should use the command uptime to see the load
you want your cpu to work 100%
you dont want it to be broken do you?
you should be worried it you are doing some major and it not 100% (unless your compueter is one of the 500 super computers)
